title: Input type (Byte) and weight type (Float) should be the same
body_html:
I was following the mnist guide but this shit doesn't want to work, just giving me headaches.

I'm actually importing the data from a numpy array using the from_numpy function.

I Keep Getting this error RuntimeError: Input type (Byte) and weight type (Float) should be the same

body:
I was following the mnist guide but this shit doesn't want to work, just giving me headaches.

I'm actually importing the data from a numpy array using the from_numpy function.

I Keep Getting this error RuntimeError: Input type (Byte) and weight type (Float) should be the same
